meanings.definition: A covering or ornament for the head, worn for protection, decoration, or ceremonial purposes.
meanings.sent1: The tribal chief wore a colorful headdress during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: She bought a beautiful headdress adorned with feathers for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the headdress was a toy and tried to play with it.
meanings.sent4: Her headdress of flowers made her look like a walking garden.
meanings.sent5: The headdress sparkled under the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The head covering worn by a person of a particular rank or profession.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his military headdress during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The nurse put on her white headdress before starting her shift at the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The chef's headdress was so tall that he had to duck through doorways.
meanings.sent4: Her headdress of office supplies symbolized her role as the office manager.
meanings.sent5: The headdress of the king was encrusted with precious gems, showcasing his status.
